name: Lobster Roll Recipe by Tasty
description: Here's what you need: celery, mayonnaise, lemon, lemon zest, fresh chives, fine sea salt, freshly ground black pepper, lobster meat, hot dog bun
recipeIngredient: 1¼ pounds lobster meat, coarsely chopped (from 4-5 large cooked lobster tails)
recipeInstructionSteps: In a large bowl, combine the celery, ⅓ cup (80 g) of the mayonnaise, lemon zest, lemon juice, and chives.
Stir in the lobster meat just to combine.
Brush the inside of the hotdog buns with the remaining 2 tablespoons mayonnaise.
Toast in a large skillet set over medium heat.
